ISSUE.TITLE: Cleanup process for old query results
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Right now the backend stores all query results it ever received, but in the UI you can access only the last one. We should have an (optional) cleanup process that will remove old query results. <!--- @huboard:{"order":107.0,"milestone_order":107,"custom_state":""} -->
